context.name: Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12×50 Rifle Scope has been designed with the Air Rifle shooter in mind, helping you to achieve accurate pellet trajectories whether shooting targets or hunting.
context.content:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope has been designed with the Air Rifle shooter in mind, helping you to achieve accurate pellet trajectories whether shooting targets or hunting. Featuring side focus control, the AMX reticle and infinitely adjustable infra-red illumination.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope Features

16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
Stepless rheostat offers total brightness control
Â¼ MOA exposed, locking and resettable turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring
